desc: Plateau Design field pouches are durable, lightweight and designed by a geologist for all field work. Made from heavy duty cordura with medical grade velcro and strong webbing. Keep all your field tools in one safe place with easy opening/closings.

layout.text: HOME OF THE BEST FIELD POUCH ON THE MARKET
Designed by a geologist for geologists, biologists, archeologists, birders and everybody who is out standing in the field.
